item.title: Creating a Hugo static blog, part I
item.description: Introduction In this journal I will describe the creation process if this very blog. I have been tinkering with web technology for a long time. My first website was a simple static HTML page with fancy colors, tables and horizontal bars. Then I started to create my own php-powered dynamic sites before moving to Symfony. More recently I experimented with various heavy duty CMS such as Drupal, Rails and Wordpress .
